title: [CLIENT] Lunar Revel Shop Skin Bug
body: In my lunar revel shop, it is giving me a discount on 'Jack of Hearts' Twisted Fate, which is great and all except I don't own Twisted Fate.

replies.body:
oh no its a bundle you see?

you get some champs with skins for the rp price listed its rlly cool and was in snowdown too
This is intentional - you will receive skins for champions you may not own.
